DDL:
CREATE TABLE countries (
    country_id INTEGER,
    country_name TEXT,
    country_code_2 VARCHAR(2),
    country_code_3 VARCHAR(3),
    region TEXT,
    sub_region TEXT,
    intermediate_region TEXT,
    created_on TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cities (
    city_id INTEGER,
    city_name TEXT,
    latitude REAL,
    longitude REAL,
    country_code_2 VARCHAR(2),
    capital INTEGER,
    population INT,
    insert_date TEXT
);
